casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jessica Rasheeda JORDAN. No. 299P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 24, 2015. Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jordan, Jessica. Alesia Mikhaulauna Balshakova, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2015 by Plaintiff-Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of August 2015."
